Patients undergo tumor tissue sample collection baseline surgery laboratory study . Samples analyze routine histology , immunohistochemistry , western blotting , RT-PCR Grm1 expression , - RAS B-raf mutation , PLC MAP kinase activity , Ki-67 staining , mitotic rate .
